error_replay_scene_locked: Scene has not been discovered yet.
error_replay_save_disabled: Saves are disabled, cannot replay scene right now.
please_select_game: Please select or create a game and a mod first.
please_select_game_or_create_first: Please select or create a game first.
quest.start: A new quest has been started: |quest|!
item.added: |item||quantity| has been added to your inventory!
invalid_id: Invalid ID. Make sure you filled a new entity form correctly.
not_enough_space_for_crafting: Not enough space in the inventory to craft.
no_recipes_learned: You don't know any recipes for this crafting station.
pool_entries_cleaned: Removed |count| orphan filter field(s) from pool entries
id_save_warning:
Warning: Changing an existing 'id' is not recommended.
This can lead to broken references, game state corruption, or issues with save files if not managed carefully across all related files and data.
Do you want to proceed with saving the changed ID?
rooms.drag.title: Drag Room
rooms.drag.description: Drag any room to the desired position. Use the mouse wheel to drag the map.
rooms.add.title: Create Room
rooms.add.description: Add a new room by clicking anywhere on the map.
rooms.connect.title: Connect Rooms
rooms.connect.description:
1) Shift + click on a room to select it.
2) Click on another room to connect it to the selected room.
3) Hold Alt to remove the connection.
rooms.fog_polygon.title: Set Fog Polygon
rooms.fog_polygon.description:
1) Shift + click on a room to select it.
2) Release shift and start clicking on the map to add points to the polygon.
3) Move a point by dragging it.
4) Hold alt to delete a point.
rooms.delete.title: Delete Room
rooms.delete.description: Click on the room to delete it.
encounters.drag.title: Drag Encounter
encounters.drag.description: Drag an encounter's image to the desired position. Use the mouse wheel to drag the map.
encounters.add.title: Create Encounter
encounters.add.description: Add a new encounter by clicking anywhere on the map.
encounters.set_image.title: Set Image
encounters.set_image.description: Click on an encounter to set the image.
encounters.set_polygon.title: Set Polygon
encounters.set_polygon.description:
1) Shift + click on an encounter to select it.
2) Release shift and start clicking on the map to add points to the polygon.
3) Move a point by dragging it.
4) Hold alt to delete a point.
encounters.delete.title: Delete Encounter
encounters.delete.description: Click on the encounter to delete it.
create_dungeon_error: Please select a game and a mod first.
error_save_empty_name: The save name cannot be empty.
msg.clear_all: Note: the tokens will be deleted from your PC only. If you shared a token with someone, they can still use it. To deactivate the token, go to Google Cloud Console.
game_created: Game created successfully. Change tabs to start editing it.
error_delete_save_no_game: Cannot delete save: No game selected.
error_save_no_game_file: Cannot save to file: No game selected.
error_save_empty_name_file: The save name cannot be empty.
webp_conversion_success_backup: Converted to WebP! Saved |savings| (|percent|%). Original backed up to |path|
webp_conversion_success_no_backup: Converted to WebP! Saved |savings| (|percent|%). Original PNG kept in place.
webp_backup_failed: Conversion succeeded but failed to backup original. PNG kept in place.
webp_conversion_failed: Failed to convert |file| to WebP. Using original PNG.
export_no_devsettings: Cannot export: dev_settings.json not found. Create one in the Dev Settings tab.
version_incompatible: This requires engine version |required| or higher. Your current version is |current|. Please download the latest engine version to play.
version_incompatible_generic: This is incompatible with the current engine version.
item_not_found_in_source: Item not found in source inventory
auto_save_failed: Failed to auto-save. Returning to editor.
google_auth_no_token: No active access token. Please create or select a token.
google_auth_token_expired_no_refresh: Token expired and no refresh token available. Please re-authenticate.
google_auth_oauth_config_missing: Cannot refresh token: OAuth credentials not found. Please re-authenticate.
google_docs_fetch_token_expired: Failed to fetch document: |error|. The token might be expired or invalid.
